description:
This course teaches you how to solve your problems through simple and powerful NLP exercises. We all face challenges and problems in our life but when it comes to solving them , we end up struggling . We are always able to solve other people's problem but not our own . By taking this course you will be able to solve all your problems and challenges easily whether it is big or small.

The techniques taught in this course are-

1) Introduction

2) Question technique - Part 1

3) Question technique - Part 2

4) Solve your problems using Self hypnosis

5) Create a guide/guru for yourself-1

6) Create a guide/guru for yourself-2

7) Solve your problems using pictures

8) Summary of the course
title: Learn to solve your problems now through NLP
